description: The latest in blockchain tech upgrades, funding announcements and deals. For the week of Oct. 9-15, with live updates throughout.

title: Caroline Ellison: Sam Bankman-Fried Told Me to Take Billions From FTX Customers
description: In a brief hearing at Bankman-Fried's trial, Caroline Ellison told jurors that Bankman-Fried "directed her to commit crimes."

title: Sony PlayStation 5 Slim Console Revealed—And It's More Expensive
description: The rumored slim Sony PlayStation 5 is coming in November with tweaks and upgrades, and a higher base price.

title: Trader Joe’s Wants All Profits in Trademark Lawsuit Against Trader Joe DeFi Platform
description: Grocery store chain Trader Joe's is once again attempting to shut down the similarly-named DeFi platform, after failing to last year.

title: Far-Right Groups Harness Technology for Online Activism and Propaganda
description: In recent years, far-right extremist groups in the United Kingdom have increasingly leveraged technology to amplify their messages, recruit followers, and further their agendas. This shift represents a move away from their early internet presence on forums and closed online spaces towards a more transnational approach, using various social media platforms and even artificial intelligence ... title: ChatGPT Mobile Business Achieves Record Revenue Amid GenAI Challenges
description: ChatGPT’s mobile business experienced an astounding upswing, setting new records in terms of downloads and revenue. This achievement is particularly noteworthy as it occurred during a challenging period for the global generative AI (GenAI) market, which has been grappling to recover from a substantial downturn following a peak in Q1. title: Hacken announces partnership with Radix
description: Blockchain Security Auditor Hacken has partnered with layer-1 innovative contract platform Radix.

title: Web3 foundation plans to allocate $22 Million to Polkadot projects
description: The Web3 Foundation, a firm whose flagship project is the Polkadot blockchain protocol, has unveiled a new initiative to allocate $22.08 million and 5 million DOTs throughout the year 2024.

title: Charles Hoskinson Blasts Mainstream Media for Exonerating SBF: Corruption in Plain Sight
description: Controversy swirls around SBF’s portrayal in a book by Michael Lewis, with some criticizing it as an attempt to excuse his actions. Influential figures like Charles Hoskinson and Nassim Nicholas Taleb weigh in, sparking a debate about SBF’s character and accountability. title: Bitcoin Lingers at Critical Point on the Wyckoff Pattern, Will it Hit $40K?
description:
Trader and analyst Moustache tweeted that BTC has been retracing in a Wyckoff pattern and was gearing for a spike since it bottomed in 2022. Moustache stated that it will be a “choppy Price Analysis” until it shoots towards $40,000 and leaves the masses in disbelief. To further supplement his prediction, he attached his previous […]
